title: Augustus Becomes Emperor
description: Octavian is granted the title of Augustus by the Roman Senate, marking the traditional beginning of the Pax Romana.

title: Battle of the Teutoburg Forest
description: A major defeat for Roman legions in Germania, though the Pax Romana largely continued in other areas.

title: Death of Augustus
description: Augustus dies, and Tiberius becomes the second Roman Emperor.

title: Great Fire of Rome
description: A devastating fire that destroys much of Rome, leading to significant rebuilding efforts.

title: Height of the Roman Empire
description: The Roman Empire reaches its greatest territorial extent under Emperor Trajan.
